t: Check out this Amazon review of Allergy Eye Itch Relief Eye Drops by Alaway, Antihistamine, 10 mL
s: Once it went OTC I started buying a Walmart brand. I also have used Patanol with Olopatadine as the active ingredient. But Patanol is really, really expensive. After my doctor told me that both Ketotifen and Olopatadine were mast cell stablizers (mast cells produce the histimine that makes your eyes itch and swell)I decided to try the OTC versions. This version, Alaway...
